titles.title: Free Trade in the Americas Act
A bill to authorize negotiation of free trade agreements with the countries of the Americas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1393)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Free Trade In the Americas Act - Requires the President to initiate trade agreement negotiations with Western Hemisphere countries for the reduction and elimination of tariffs and nontariff trade barriers, and the establishment of a Western Hemisphere free trade area.
